body:
Hi guys,



I would like to know if it is possible to avoid the cmd line from popping up each time it starts a new calculation in case of using "Brute force solver" or "Galapagos" or any other kind of automatic change of parameters.



My question concerns energyPlus and Radiance calculations within Honeybee.



Any help would be very much appreciated,

Regards,



Aymeric
topic: Honeybee : Is it possible to prevent cmd window from popping up?
